Class DonorAccountHandler

java.lang.Object
DonorAccountHandler
public class DonorAccountHandler extends Object
This is the Donor Account Handler class. It contains methods to handle existing Donor Accounts in a DC

  • Constructor Details

    • DonorAccountHandler

      public DonorAccountHandler()

  • Method Details

    • createDonor

      public static boolean createDonor(String donorID, String password, String phoneNumber)
      Returns a true or false if a donor account exists within the file based on their donorID. If a donor account does not exist, a new account is created.
      Parameters:
      donorID - the donor id of the user's choosing
      password - the password of the donor account the user chooses
      phoneNumber - the phone number of the donor
      Returns:
      false if an account exists within the file, true if it does not exist

    • verifyAccount

      public static boolean verifyAccount(String donorID, String password)
      Verifies if a donor account is valid based on the donorID and the password input by the user.
      Parameters:
      donorID - the ID of the donor
      password - the password of the donor account
      Returns:
      a true if the account exists and the password is correct, false otherwise.

    • getDonors

      protected static HashSet<Donor> getDonors()
      Returns an HashSet containing all the Donor accounts found within the file. The Donor consists of the donorID, the password, and donor's phone number
      Returns:
      HashSet of all the donor accounts found within the file

    • getUser

      public static Donor getUser(String donorID)
      Returns a donor object found within the file based on donorID given
      Parameters:
      donorID - the donorID of the donor the user wishes to find
      Returns:
      the donor object associated with the donorID given. If no matches are found, return null.

    • deleteDonor

      public static void deleteDonor(Donor account)
      Sets a donor account's status to inactive. Data concerning the donations they have made are not deleted.
      Parameters:
      account - the account to be deleted.
